title: Someone wanna tell me...
body:
http://imgur.com/UNr7fVH

How a tahm kench can build 0 dmg and still carry an entire team? 4000+ health and unkillable, presses one ability and gets a half-health shield.
I mean at least adcs and assassins one shotting is reasonable but why is this guy even doing dmg????

replies.body:
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/160922806/201426662?tab=stats

malphite builds not 1 damage item. does  the most damage in the game.

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-g4DxfI3VP5M/UjRoDyK63aI/AAAAAAAAAVc/RPy2ChmxXFw/s640/meme_genius_png_by_mfsyrcm-d58rff6.png

Malphite has Armour scaling, and that match had the opposite team as almost entirely physical damage. You can clearly see that Malphite took advantage by stacking armour. I don't know what you expected there.

And it was in Ranked, mind you, where you can actually see who picks which champion. Either no one on your team thought "oh, there's champs with armour scaling, we should probably pick up a Magic Damage based high-damage champion" *or* you all *knew* they had picked Malphite and still went in with a heavily physical damage biased team.

Because i have control over what people pick in bronze?were you dropped on the head or are you just stupidly arrogant?

Regardless there a few select champions who can abuse that fact they can do more damage building defense then offense and in most games is no way in which a tank should work, but in this game it seems perfectly acceptable?

> Because i have control over what people pick in bronze?

It never hurts to ask. One of the biggest issues with low ELO is that no one ever communicates effectively. If you see something as being a potential issue, such as a heavily physical (or magic) damage biased team, say something. If people don't appreciate the fact that you've tried to help turn the game into a win, that's their problem and you can report them post-game if they're going to be a d!ck about it.

That said, me explaining this to you shouldn't result in comments like "are you stupidly arrogant" or such. That just makes you a d!ck and will probably result in you getting hit with some kind of punishment, which is something you would probably want to avoid.

> Regardless there a few select champions who can abuse that fact they can do more damage building defense then offense and in most games is no way in which a tank should work, but in this game it seems perfectly acceptable?

You're thinking of this in too much of a "black and white" situation. It's not as simple as "tanks deal lots of damage", it never is. It's extremely situational for a (more typical) tank to be dealing lots of damage, such as the scenario you encountered with the Malphite who was only able to deal significant damage while still being massively tanky because your team didn't come together and do something about the heavy physical damage bias of your composition. In a more typical situation, that Malphite (more than likely) would've just been dead weight with that build.

That said, we also have different kinds of tanks, such as Bruisers (who can deal a bit of damage while still being massively tanky) and Fighters (who are more balanced between defense and offence).

> That said, me explaining this to you shouldn't result in comments like "are you stupidly arrogant" or such. That just makes you a d!ck and will probably result in you getting hit with some kind of punishment, which is something you would probably want to avoid.

you didn't explain nothing, you just assumed, then preceded to comment like every other ignorant dumbass out there.

i always communicate in pre game chat my concerns about team comps but 99% of the time its ingored people are going to play what they are going to play regardless.

im not even going to go into the tank thing anymore because your obviously fixed on that one instance, in which i have had hundreds of others were tanks have dominated , with 1 or 0 damaging items as have countless other people.

> you didn't explain nothing, you just assumed, then preceded to comment like every other ignorant dumbass out there.

The only part of my original comment that wasn't explanation was the final sentence. True, that was a bit of an assumption on my part, *however* that doesn't mean you needed to resort to insults. You could have simply explained how the situation differed (and based on your next comment, it seems it did differ).

> im not even going to go into the tank thing anymore because your obviously fixed on that one instance, in which i have had hundreds of others were tanks have dominated , with 1 or 0 damaging items as have countless other people.

As I've pointed out, you're thinking of it too much like "black and white" and seem to be ignoring the "grey" areas. I'd be willing to discuss this further so both of us might learn something new, however don't expect much if you're just going to keep reverting to insults to get your point across.

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/facebook/000/011/869/internet_white_knight_colored_4350.jpg

another one saved.

typical low white knight trash attitude.
Heartvine, do us all a favour, get off the fucking boards please
I have the freedom to continue posting. If you don't like it, you're free to leave.
bonobo's gonna bonobo
People do not like reality, they only respond to being told they are right.
Agreed.
ok, if you think those are insults you must be a very delicate person

His ult has passive ap on hit scaling, he has good base damage. 
Same with Malphite, you build tank items and he scales off armour
Zac also builds mostly full tank (only non tank item you'd build is liandries torment. 
It's just the champ, has good base damage scaling. 
You have to build around that. You were playing Darius he's the same way, build full tank and still do a lot of damage and carry, only damage item is cleaver.
But I still have to get 5 stacks on someone before I can shred their team I know darius is op but this is just ridiculous
He farms slowly and can only hit one champ at a time... He's such a non-factor unless you actually try to kill him
The factor is that he tanks our entire team and we can't do anything to him

If you can't kill Tahm Kench, don't try to. Both sides don't have a single bit of assemblance of vision control in this game. Perhaps Blue side should think about using Master Yi as a split pusher, rather than taking 5 v5  teamfights and walking into their wombo combo team. Whereever Tahm Kench goes, Darius matches. Try a 1-3-1 strategy with teamwork and communication. Tahm Kench is slow and his split push is garbage. Play around him, not against him. You don't have to play every game like a smash up derby in ARAM form :)

Even a 4-1 strategy would be better, use the Blitz from fog of war to get picks. There's heaps of things that Blue side can do to neutralise the Kench.
because tank and assassin meta OP
Trying to climb back out of bronze be like...

Welcome to Riot games.

This is a copy pasted response, we hope you enjoy your stay in our lovely game, unfortunately you didn't use a keyword that will actually get you a direct response from anyone at riot games, and thus this is what you have recieved, if you want to continue trying to get a keyword, feel free to reply to this message with as many keywords as you think will work, unfortunately for you, there is only one key word and it is stupid

Have a nice day, From Rito Games.
LOL
